title: #WeBleedPurple (@TrueAmBitionGG) | Twitter Semi Professional Team Looking for Diamond + Jungler

embed.description: The latest Tweets from #WeBleedPurple (@TrueAmBitionGG). International gaming organization with teams in GOW - HALO - SSB - COD-LOL!. WorldWide

body:
**Must be active and have a positive attitude to the team **
COMMENT BELOW IF INTERESTED

replies.body: Hey dude, would you consider a plat 1? If so add me in game on XSirCution, thank you!
